name: systems-programming
description: Comprehensive systems programming with C, C++, Rust, and Go. Includes enhanced agents, project scaffolding commands, performance profiling workflows, and systems programming patterns skill.

commands.name: /rust-project
commands.description: Scaffold production-ready Rust projects with proper structure, cargo tooling, and testing

commands.description: Scaffold production-ready C projects with Makefile/CMake, testing, and memory safety tools

commands.name: /profile-performance
commands.description: Comprehensive performance profiling workflow using perf, valgrind, and hardware counters

agents.name: rust-pro
agents.description: Master Rust 1.75+ with modern async patterns, advanced type system, and production systems programming

agents.name: c-pro

agents.name: golang-pro

skills.name: systems-programming-patterns
